tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BicycleRaces (
  race_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  race_title VARCHAR(255),
  race_location VARCHAR(255),
  participant_id INT,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  race_result VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE race_results (
  race_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  race_name VARCHAR,
  race_date DATE,
  winner_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES participant_details(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE race_results (
    race_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    race_name VARCHAR(50),
    race_date DATE,
    winner_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES participant_details(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Results ( 
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  participant_id INT, 
 race_id INT, 
 result_time TIME, 
 result_position INT 
);

CREATE TABLE Participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    race_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    finish_time TIME,
    position INT
);
